tuv.seg: AnotherSocialEconomy notification about request: {demand>key}
ezToff notification about request: {demand>key}
|--|This command will be sent to AnotherSocialEconomy's automated command parser.
cancel demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
close demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
propose demand:{demand>key} qty:[] tags:[] unit-price:[] total-cost:[] due-date:[] {command>footer}
cancel proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
confirm proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
decline proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
close proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}

FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following Demand creation ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}.

FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following Demand creation ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metada} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}.

FYI. Can you supply {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the "?" and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:? unit-price:? total-cost:? due-date:{demand>dueDate}'.

FYI. Can you supply {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metada} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the "?" and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:? metadata:{pullCart:{demand>metadata>pullCart},golfCart:{demand>metada>golfCart}} round-price:? total-cost:? tee-time:{demand>dueDate}'.

FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following Demand update ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} dueDate:{demand>dueDate}.

FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following tee-off request update ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} pullCart:{demand>metadata>pullCart} golfCart:{demand>metadata>golfCart} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}.
:-) Hi {demand>owner>name}. Thank you for confirming proposal:{proposal>key} for demand:{demand>key} | The store:{store>key} {store>name} will be asked to mark and hold demand:{demand>key}.

:-) Hi {demand>owner>name}. Thank you for confirming proposal:{proposal>key} for tee-off request:{demand>key} | The golf course {store>name} will be asked to reserve the tee-off time {demand>dueDate}.

:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, proposal:{proposal>key} for request:{demand>key} has been confirmed.| Please mark, hold for Consumer with request:{demand>key} and then 'close proposal:{proposal>key}', or, 'flag proposal:{proposal>key} note:your-note-here'.

:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, proposal:{proposal>key} on {proposal>dueDate} has been confirmed.| Please mark, schedule the tee-off request:{demand>key} and then 'close proposal:{proposal>key}', or, 'flag proposal:{proposal>key} note:your-note-here'.

Hi {0},
The reservation under ezToff Proposal# {9} has been closed. We'll be updating your Rating shortly.
If you enjoyed using ezToff, please recommend us to your fellow golfers, or, simply CC them next time. {22}
